pullrequest.title: Save buttons to the right, cancel buttons to the left

content.raw:
Oh awesome, I tried a few button roles with no luck so decided to make them all Action because that seemed to respect the order they're added.

Personally, I think having `Cancel` always on the extreme left feels more natural, how about this?

+ Cancel | Don't Save, Exit | Save and Exit

+ Cancel | Don't Save | Save
content.html:
Oh awesome, I tried a few button roles with no luck so decided to make them all Action because that seemed to respect the order they're added.

Personally, I think having Cancel always on the extreme left feels more natural, how about this?

  • Cancel | Don't Save, Exit | Save and Exit

  • Cancel | Don't Save | Save
